member.name: M:GigaDll.GigaScientificGraph.CreateSGraphBasic(Gigasoft.ProEssentials.Pesgo,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String[],System.Double[])
member.summary: 创建Scientific Graph 基本坐标图
member.param: 子图数量 - 大于0时为设置的子图数量 小于等于0时子图数量为1
点数量 - 大于0时为设置的点数量 小于等于0时不设置点数量
X/Y坐标轴标签 - 数组维数为2
X/Y坐标轴范围,当最小值大于等于最大值时,坐标轴范围为自动,数组维数为2

member.name: M:GigaDll.GigaScientificGraph.CreateSingleCircleSymbol(Gigasoft.ProEssentials.Pesgo,System.Int32,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.String,System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32,System.Byte)
member.summary: 绘制一个Circle形状
member.param: 标记符号索引,一次需要3个索引

填充风格: EllipseThin = 64, EllipseDash = 65, EllipseDot = 66, EllipseDashDot = 67, EllipseDashDotDot = 68, EllipseMedium = 69, EllipseThick = 70, EllipseFill = 71, EllipseHatchHorizontal = 169, EllipseHatchVertical = 170, EllipseHatchFdiagonal = 171, EllipseHatchBdiagonal = 172, EllipseHatchCross = 173, EllipseHatchDiagCross = 174, EllipseMediumDash = 141, EllipseMediumDot = 142, EllipseMediumDashDot = 143, EllipseMediumDashDotDot = 144, EllipseThickDash = 145, EllipseThickDot = 146, EllipseThickDashDot = 147, EllipseThickDashDotDot = 148
是否在上面 - 0:在下面; 1:在上面

member.name: M:GigaDll.GigaScientificGraph.CreateSinglePolygonSymbol(Gigasoft.ProEssentials.Pesgo,System.Int32,System.Single[],System.Single[],System.String[],System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32,System.Byte)
member.summary: 绘制一个多边形形状 - polygon - 顺时针方向
member.param: 标记符号索引,一次需要n个索引

填充风格: EndPolygon=76,EndPolyLineThi =77,EndPolyLineMedium=78, EndPolylineThick=79, EndPolylineDash=80, EndPolylineDot=81, EndPolylineDashDot=82,EndPolylineDashDotDot=83, EndPolyLineMediumDash = 149, EndPolyLineMediumDot = 150, EndPolyLineMediumDashDot = 151, EndPolyLineMediumDashDotDot = 152, EndPolyLineThickDash = 153, EndPolyLineThickDot = 154, EndPolyLineThickDashDot = 155, EndPolyLineThickDashDotDot = 156, EndPolygonHatchHorizontal = 175,EndPolygonHatchVertical = 176, EndPolygonHatchFdiagonal = 177, EndPolygonHatchBdiagonal = 178,EndPolygonHatchCross = 179,EndPolygonHatchDiagCross = 180
是否在上面 - 0:在下面; 1:在上面

member.name: M:GigaDll.GigaSimpleGraph.CreateSimpleGraphBasic(Gigasoft.ProEssentials.Pego,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String[],System.Double[])
member.summary: 创建Simple Graph 基本坐标图
member.param: 子图数量 - 大于0时为设置的子图数量 小于等于0时子图数量为1
点数量 - 大于0时为设置的点数量 小于等于0时不设置点数量
X/Y坐标轴标签 - 数组维数为2
X/Y坐标轴范围,当最小值大于等于最大值时,坐标轴范围为自动,数组维数为2
